2019 Isuzu D-Max 300 LX Auto Double-Cab Auto

attributes.agent_name: Auto Ranch Pre Owned Cape Town
attributes.description:
Possibly the cutest crossover around, this little Ignis is stunning in Pearlecent Blue with White Roof, brand new Dunlop Sport tyres on chunky 15 inch Alloy wheels, and best of all, it's automatic!
Finance available (Approx R3350pm with 10% deposit), Extended Warranty available, and trade-ins considered.

ENQUIRIES:
To enquire, or for any additional information or assistance, please feel free to call Or WhatsApp Aaron on 083 453 8968 or e-mail autoranch@mweb.co.za. Viewing times are Mon-Fri from 9am-5pm, Saturdays 9.30am-12pm.

WHERE TO FIND US:
We are located at the John Montague Centre in Montague Gardens, corner 1st Road and 3rd street, rear parking area of the centre, across from the Takealot depot. If possible, please call or WhatsApp message ahead to ensure the car you are interested is available and ready to view and drive.

Suzuki Ignis 1.2 GLX AT

Power -  61 kW @ 6000 rpm
Torque -  113 Nm @ 4200 rpm
Economy - 4.9 l/100km
Emissions - 114 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 5 / FRONT
Acceleration - 13 seconds
Top Speed - 155 km/h
Airbags (total) - 2
Length - 3,700 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 32 litres
Boot Capacity - 260 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
